snippet.title: Mystery Case Files: Shadow Lake -- OFFICIAL Trailer [HD]
snippet.description:
The official game trailer for Mystery Case Files: Shadow Lake.
Developer: Big Fish Studios
Publisher: Big Fish Games
Release Date: November 20th, 2012
Platforms: PC/Mac

Mystery Case Files (MCF) is a hidden object adventure game where you will solve puzzles and find clues to solve the mystery. Known for its engrossing story lines, MCF offers players an immersive gaming experience.

Visit http://sparq.me/shadowlake for more information!
